review.title: “Poor Management”
review.pros: Pros – Easy work to do, if you show up and have any common sense at all you can do the job
review.cons: Cons – There is no respsect for employees Management is a joke, I'm not sure how they are still in business today
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Respect your workers, give them a chance to prove abilities and grow in work. Make them feel secure in their jobs and they might stick around
